Package ure.ui

Class ULightcell

  • java.lang.Object
    • ure.ui.ULightcell
  • public class ULightcell
extends java.lang.Object
    ULightcell represents a single xy grid cell of a Camera. Tracks all light hitting that cell of the camera. Normal users shouldn't need to mess with this except for unusual camera effects.
